message: Hitler got in as a """"Nationalist"""". All despots have, and then when they want to conquer the world it's in the name of """"making our country great again"""". History is replete with Trumps. None of the past """"Globalist Presidents"""" (including Reagan) since Hoover have rejected our nations sovereignty, and I find it ironic that the person you expect to lead us past the corporate-political institution is a corporate institution unto himself. The only reason NAFTA works is rich people like Trump, who have taken their manufacturing need and shipped it off to Mexico or China. Remeber his nationalism next time you put on his shirt or hat.
